title: Hey, You chose to add a server!

messageError: The server list has failed. It has not been created.

messageError: You must be administrator to delete a server from the list.
the server you asked to delete is not in the list.

values: - Usable by everyone to add a server to the list.
- Usable only by administrator to delete a server from the list.
- If you're list with commands, use it.
- Usable to show all server in our database.
- Usable to show a certain amount of server in our database.
- usable to show servers in function of their Gamemode or version.
- With this command, you can set the channel to send the server list each x time.
